Network.description: Container for all components and functions which act upon the whole network.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.snapshots: List of snapshots or time steps. All time-dependent series quantities are indexed by ``network.snapshots``. To reset the snapshots, call ``network.set_snapshots(new)``.
attrs.snapshot_weightings: The weightings applied to each snapshot, so that snapshots can represent more than one hour or fractions of one hour. The objective weightings are used to weight snapshots in the LOPF objective function. The store weightings determine the state of charge change for stores and storage units. The generator weightings are used when calculating global constraints.
attrs.investment_periods: Time periods of investment. Only used for multi investment optimisation. Years have to be integer and increasing (e.g. [2025,2030,2035]). Default is an empty pd.Index([]).
attrs.investment_period_weightings: Weightings applied to each investment period. Objective weightings are multiplied with all cost coefficients in the objective function of the respective investment period (e.g. used to include social discount rate). Years weighting denote the elapsed time until the subsequent investment period (e.g. used for global constraints CO2 emissions).
attrs.now: The current snapshot/time/scenario, relevant e.g. when ``network.pf()`` is called without a snapshot argument.
attrs.srid: Spatial Reference System Indentifier for x,y coordinates of buses. It defaults to standard longitude and latitude.
attrs.crs: Coordinate Reference System for the Shape components. It defaults to standard longitude and latitude, given in srid.
attrs.buses: All static bus information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Index is bus names, columns are bus attributes.
attrs.buses_t: All time-dependent bus information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Dictionary keys are time-dependent series attributes, index is network.snapshots, columns are bus names.
attrs.lines: All static line information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Index is line names, columns are line attributes.
attrs.lines_t: All time-dependent line information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Dictionary keys are time-dependent series attributes, index is network.snapshots, columns are line names.
attrs.components: For each component type (buses, lines, etc.): static component information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Index is component names, columns are component attributes.
attrs.components_t: For each component type (buses, lines, etc.): time-dependent component information compiled by PyPSA from inputs. Dictionary keys are time-dependent series attributes, index is network.snapshots, columns are component names.
attrs.branches(): Dynamically generated concatenation of branch DataFrames: network.lines, network.transformers and network.links. Note that this is a copy and therefore changing entries will NOT update the original.

SubNetwork.description: Subsets of buses and passive branches (i.e. lines and transformers) that are connected (i.e. synchronous areas).

attrs.name: Unique name based on order of sub-network in list of sub-networks.
attrs.carrier: Energy carrier: could be for example "AC" or "DC" (for electrical networks) or "gas" or "heat". The carrier is determined from the buses in sub_network.

Bus.description: Electrically fundamental node where x-port objects attach.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.type: Placeholder for bus type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.x: Position (e.g. longitude); the Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID) is set in network.srid.
attrs.y: Position (e.g. latitude); the Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID) is set in network.srid.
attrs.carrier: Energy carrier: can be "AC" or "DC" for electrical buses, or "heat" or "gas".
attrs.unit: Unit of the bus’ carrier if the implicitly assumed unit ("MW") is inappropriate (e.g. "t/h", "MWh_th/h"). Only descriptive. Does not influence any PyPSA functions.
attrs.v_mag_pu_set: Voltage magnitude set point, per unit of v_nom.
attrs.v_mag_pu_min: Minimum desired voltage, per unit of v_nom. This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.v_mag_pu_max: Maximum desired voltage, per unit of v_nom.  This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.control: P,Q,V control strategy for PF, must be "PQ", "PV" or "Slack". Note that this attribute is an output inherited from the controls of the generators attached to the bus; setting it directly on the bus will not have any effect.
attrs.generator: Name of slack generator attached to slack bus.
attrs.sub_network: Name of connected sub-network to which bus belongs. This attribute is set by PyPSA in the function network.determine_network_topology(); do not set it directly by hand.
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net generation at bus)
attrs.q: reactive power (positive if net generation at bus)
attrs.v_mag_pu: Voltage magnitude, per unit of v_nom
attrs.marginal_price: Locational marginal price from LOPF from power balance constraint

Carrier.description: Energy carrier, such as AC, DC, heat, wind, PV or coal. Buses have direct carriers and Generators indicate their primary energy carriers.  The Carrier can track properties relevant for global constraints, such as CO2 emissions.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.co2_emissions: Emissions in CO2-tonnes-equivalent per MWh of primary energy (e.g. methane has 0.2 tonnes_CO2/MWh_thermal).
attrs.max_growth: maximum new installed capacity per investment period
attrs.max_relative_growth: maximum capacity ratio for new installed capacity per investment period (in addition to max_growth)

GlobalConstraint.description: Constraints for OPF that affect many components, such as CO2 emission constraints.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.type: Type of constraint (only "primary energy", i.e. limits on the usage of primary energy before generator conversion, is supported at the moment)
attrs.investment_period: time period when the constraint is applied, if not specified, constraint is applied to all investment periods
attrs.carrier_attribute: If the global constraint is connected with an energy carrier, name the associated carrier attribute. This must appear as a column in network.carriers.
attrs.sense: Constraint sense; must be one of <=, == or >=
attrs.constant: Constant for right-hand-side of constraint for optimisation period. For a CO2 constraint, this would be tonnes of CO2-equivalent emissions.

Line.description: Lines include distribution and transmission lines, overhead lines and cables.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus0: Name of first bus to which branch is attached.
attrs.bus1: Name of second bus to which branch is attached.
attrs.type: Name of line standard type. If this is not an empty string "", then the line standard type impedance parameters are multiplied with the line length and divided/multiplied by num_parallel to compute x, r, etc. This will override any values set in r, x, and b. If the string is empty, PyPSA will simply read r, x, etc.
attrs.x: Series reactance, must be non-zero for AC branch in linear power flow. If the line has series inductance :math:`L` in Henries then :math:`x = 2\pi f L` where :math:`f` is the frequency in Hertz. Series impedance :math:`z = r + jx` must be non-zero for the non-linear power flow. Ignored if type defined.
attrs.r: Series resistance, must be non-zero for DC branch in linear power flow. Series impedance :math:`z = r + jx` must be non-zero for the non-linear power flow. Ignored if type defined.
attrs.g: Shunt conductivity. Shunt admittance is :math:`y = g + jb`.
attrs.b: Shunt susceptance. If the line has shunt capacitance :math:`C` in Farads then :math:`b = 2\pi f C` where :math:`f` is the frequency in Hertz. Shunt admittance is :math:`y = g + jb`. Ignored if type defined.
attrs.s_nom: Limit of apparent power which can pass through branch.
attrs.s_nom_mod: Limit of apparent power of the line module.
attrs.s_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity s_nom to be extended in OPF.
attrs.s_nom_min: If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
attrs.s_nom_max: If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential).
attrs.s_max_pu: The maximum allowed absolute flow per unit of s_nom for the OPF (e.g. can be set <1 to approximate n-1 factor, or can be time-varying to represent weather-dependent dynamic line rating for overhead lines).
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending s_nom by 1 MVA, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.length: Length of line used when "type" is set, also useful for calculating the capital cost.
attrs.carrier: Type of current, "AC" is the only valid value
attrs.terrain_factor: Terrain factor for increasing capital cost.
attrs.num_parallel: When "type" is set, this is the number of parallel lines (can also be fractional). If "type" is empty "" this value is ignored.
attrs.v_ang_min: Minimum voltage angle difference across the line. This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.v_ang_max: Maximum voltage angle difference across the line. This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.sub_network: Name of connected sub-network to which lines belongs. This attribute is set by PyPSA in the function network.determine_network_topology(); do not set it directly by hand.
attrs.p0: Active power at bus0 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus0).
attrs.q0: Reactive power at bus0 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus0).
attrs.p1: Active power at bus1 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus1).
attrs.q1: Reactive power at bus1 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus1).
attrs.x_pu: Per unit series reactance calculated by PyPSA from x and bus.v_nom.
attrs.r_pu: Per unit series resistance calculated by PyPSA from r and bus.v_nom
attrs.g_pu: Per unit shunt conductivity calculated by PyPSA from g and bus.v_nom
attrs.b_pu: Per unit shunt susceptance calculated by PyPSA from b and bus.v_nom
attrs.x_pu_eff: Effective per unit series reactance for linear power flow, calculated by PyPSA from x, tap_ratio for transformers and bus.v_nom.
attrs.r_pu_eff: Effective per unit series resistance for linear power flow, calculated by PyPSA from x, tap_ratio for transformers and bus.v_nom.
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower s_nom limit  -F \leq f. Always non-negative.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper s_nom limit f \leq F. Always non-negative.

LineType.description: Standard line types with per length values for impedances.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.mounting: Can be "ol" for overhead line or "cs" for cable

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus0: Name of first bus (typically higher voltage) to which transformer is attached.
attrs.bus1: Name of second bus (typically lower voltage) to which transformer is attached.
attrs.type: Name of 2-winding transformer standard type. If this is not an empty string "", then the transformer type impedance parameters are taken from the standard type along with "num_parallel". This will override any values set in r, x, g, b, s_nom, tap_ratio, tap_side and phase_shift. If the string is empty, PyPSA will simply read r, x, etc.
attrs.model: Model used for admittance matrix; can be "t" or "pi"; since PyPSA Version 0.8.0 it defaults to "t" following physics and DIgSILENT PowerFactory; versions of PyPSA before 0.8.0 and some other power system tools, like MATPOWER, PYPOWER, PSS/SINCAL use the less physical "pi" model.
attrs.x: Series reactance (per unit, using s_nom as base power); must be non-zero for AC branch in linear power flow. Series impedance :math:`z = r + jx` must be non-zero for the non-linear power flow. Ignored if type defined.
attrs.r: Series resistance (per unit, using s_nom as base power); must be non-zero for DC branch in linear power flow. Series impedance :math:`z = r + jx` must be non-zero for the non-linear power flow. Ignored if type defined.
attrs.g: Shunt conductivity (per unit, using s_nom as base power). Ignored if type defined.
attrs.b: Shunt susceptance (per unit, using s_nom as base power). Ignored if type defined.
attrs.s_nom: Limit of apparent power which can pass through branch.
attrs.s_nom_mod: Limit of apparent power of the transformer module.
attrs.s_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity s_nom to be extended in OPF.
attrs.s_nom_min: If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
attrs.s_nom_max: If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential).
attrs.s_max_pu: The maximum allowed absolute flow per unit of s_nom for the OPF.
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending p_nom by 1 MVA, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.num_parallel: When "type" is set, this is the number of parallel transformers (can also be fractional). If "type" is empty "" this value is ignored.
attrs.tap_ratio: Ratio of per unit voltages at each bus for tap changed.  Ignored if type defined.
attrs.tap_side: Defines if tap changer is modelled at the primary 0 side (usually high-voltage) or the secondary 1 side (usually low voltage) (must be 0 or 1, defaults to 0). Ignored if type defined.
attrs.tap_position: If the transformer has a type, determines position relative to the neutral tap position.
attrs.phase_shift: Voltage phase angle shift.  Ignored if type defined.
attrs.v_ang_min: Minimum voltage angle difference across the transformer. This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.v_ang_max: Maximum voltage angle difference across the transformer. This is a placeholder attribute and is not currently used by any PyPSA functions.
attrs.sub_network: Name of connected sub-network to which transformer belongs. This attribute is set by PyPSA in the function network.determine_network_topology(); do not set it directly by hand.
attrs.p0: Active power at bus0 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus0).
attrs.q0: Reactive power at bus0 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus0).
attrs.p1: Active power at bus1 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus1).
attrs.q1: Reactive power at bus1 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus1).
attrs.x_pu: Per unit series reactance calculated by PyPSA from x and bus.v_nom.
attrs.r_pu: Per unit series resistance calculated by PyPSA from r and bus.v_nom
attrs.g_pu: Per unit shunt conductivity calculated by PyPSA from g and bus.v_nom
attrs.b_pu: Per unit shunt susceptance calculated by PyPSA from b and bus.v_nom
attrs.x_pu_eff: Effective per unit series reactance for linear power flow, calculated by PyPSA from x, tap_ratio for transformers and bus.v_nom.
attrs.r_pu_eff: Effective per unit series resistance for linear power flow, calculated by PyPSA from x, tap_ratio for transformers and bus.v_nom.
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower s_nom limit  -F \leq f. Always non-negative.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper s_nom limit f \leq F. Always non-negative.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.v_nom_0: Nominal voltage on high voltage side
attrs.v_nom_1: Nominal voltage on low voltage side
attrs.vscr: Real part of short circuit voltage
attrs.tap_side: Defines if tap changer is modelled at the primary 0 side (usually high-voltage) or the secondary 1 side (usually low voltage) (must be 0 or 1, defaults to 0)
attrs.tap_neutral: rated tap position, i.e. position at which the winding ratio corresponds to the ratio of the rated voltages
attrs.tap_step: tap step size in percentage of voltage change

Link.description: Link between two buses with controllable active power - can be used for a transport power flow model OR as a simplified version of point-to-point DC connection OR as a lossy energy converter. NB: for a lossless bi-directional HVDC or transport link, set p_min_pu = -1 and efficiency = 1. NB: It is assumed that the links neither produce nor consume reactive power.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus0: Name of first bus to which link is attached.
attrs.bus1: Name of other bus to which link is attached.
attrs.type: Placeholder for link type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.carrier: Energy carrier transported by the link: can be "DC" for electrical HVDC links, or "heat" or "gas" etc.
attrs.efficiency: Efficiency of power transfer from bus0 to bus1. (Can be time-dependent to represent temperature-dependent Coefficient of Performance of a heat pump from an electric to a heat bus.)
attrs.p_nom: Limit of active power which can pass through link.
attrs.p_nom_mod: Limit of active power of the link module.
attrs.p_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity p_nom to be extended.
attrs.p_nom_min: If p_nom is extendable, set its minimum value.
attrs.p_nom_max: If p_nom is extendable, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential).
attrs.p_set: The dispatch set point for p0 of the link in PF.
attrs.p_min_pu: Minimal dispatch (can also be negative) per unit of p_nom for the link.
attrs.p_max_pu: Maximal dispatch (can also be negative) per unit of p_nom for the link.
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending p_nom by 1 MW, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.marginal_cost: Marginal cost of transfering 1 MWh (before efficiency losses) from bus0 to bus1. NB: marginal cost only makes sense if p_max_pu >= 0.
attrs.marginal_cost_quadratic: Quadratic marginal cost for transferring 1 MWh (before efficiency losses) from bus0 to bus1.
attrs.stand_by_cost: Stand-by cost for operating the link at null power flow.
attrs.length: Length of line, useful for calculating the capital cost.
attrs.terrain_factor: Terrain factor for increasing capital cost.
attrs.committable: Use unit commitment (only possible if p_nom is not extendable).
attrs.start_up_cost: Cost to start up the link. Only read if committable is True.
attrs.shut_down_cost: Cost to shut down the link. Only read if committable is True.
attrs.min_up_time: Minimum number of snapshots for status to be 1.  Only read if committable is True.
attrs.min_down_time: Minimum number of snapshots for status to be 0.  Only read if committable is True.
attrs.up_time_before: Number of snapshots that the link was online before network.snapshots start. Only read if committable is True and min_up_time is non-zero.
attrs.down_time_before: Number of snapshots that the link was offline before network.snapshots start. Only read if committable is True and min_down_time is non-zero.
attrs.ramp_limit_up: Maximum increase from one snapshot to the next, per unit of the bus0 unit. Ignored if NaN.
attrs.ramp_limit_down: Maximum decrease from one snapshot to the next, per unit of the bus0 unit. Ignored if NaN.
attrs.ramp_limit_start_up: Maximumincrease at start up, per unit of bus0 unit.   Only read if committable is True.
attrs.ramp_limit_shut_down: Maximum decrease at shut down, per unit of bus0 unit.   Only read if committable is True.
attrs.p0: Active power at bus0 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus0).
attrs.p1: Active power at bus1 (positive if branch is withdrawing power from bus1).
attrs.status: Status (1 is on, 0 is off). Only outputted if committable is True.
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower p_nom limit  -F \leq f. Always non-negative.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper p_nom limit f \leq F. Always non-negative.
attrs.mu_p_set: Shadow price of fixed power transmission p_set
attrs.mu_ramp_limit_up: Shadow price of upper ramp up limit
attrs.mu_ramp_limit_down: Shadow price of lower ramp down limit

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus: Name of bus to which load is attached.
attrs.carrier: Energy carrier: can be "AC" or "DC" for electrical buses, or "heat" or "gas".
attrs.type: Placeholder for load type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.p_set: Active power consumption (positive if the load is consuming power).
attrs.q_set: Reactive power consumption (positive if the load is inductive).
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net load)

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus: name of bus to which generator is attached
attrs.control: P,Q,V control strategy for PF, must be "PQ", "PV" or "Slack".
attrs.type: Placeholder for generator type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.p_nom: Nominal power for limits in optimization.
attrs.p_nom_mod: Nominal power of the generator module.
attrs.p_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity p_nom to be extended in optimization.
attrs.p_nom_min: If p_nom is extendable in optimization, set its minimum value.
attrs.p_nom_max: If p_nom is extendable in optimization, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by technical potential).
attrs.p_min_pu: The minimum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the optimization (e.g. for variable renewable generators this can change due to weather conditions and compulsory feed-in; for conventional generators it represents a minimal dispatch). Note that if comittable is False and p_min_pu > 0, this represents a must-run condition.
attrs.p_max_pu: The maximum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the optimization (e.g. for variable renewable generators this can change due to weather conditions; for conventional generators it represents a maximum dispatch).
attrs.carrier: Prime mover energy carrier (e.g. coal, gas, wind, solar); required for global constraints on primary energy in optimization
attrs.marginal_cost: Marginal cost of production of 1 MWh.
attrs.marginal_cost_quadratic: Quadratic marginal cost of production of 1 MWh.
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending p_nom by 1 MW, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.efficiency: Ratio between primary energy and electrical energy, e.g. takes value 0.4 MWh_elec/MWh_thermal for gas. This is required for global constraints on primary energy in optimization.
attrs.committable: Use unit commitment (only possible if p_nom is not extendable).
attrs.start_up_cost: Cost to start up the generator. Only read if committable is True.
attrs.shut_down_cost: Cost to shut down the generator. Only read if committable is True.
attrs.stand_by_cost: Stand-by cost for operating the generator at null power output.
attrs.min_up_time: Minimum number of snapshots for status to be 1.  Only read if committable is True.
attrs.min_down_time: Minimum number of snapshots for status to be 0.  Only read if committable is True.
attrs.up_time_before: Number of snapshots that the generator was online before network.snapshots start. Only read if committable is True and min_up_time is non-zero.
attrs.down_time_before: Number of snapshots that the generator was offline before network.snapshots start. Only read if committable is True and min_down_time is non-zero.
attrs.ramp_limit_up: Maximum active power increase from one snapshot to the next, per unit of the nominal power. Ignored if NaN.
attrs.ramp_limit_down: Maximum active power decrease from one snapshot to the next, per unit of the nominal power. Ignored if NaN.
attrs.ramp_limit_start_up: Maximum active power increase at start up, per unit of the nominal power.   Only read if committable is True.
attrs.ramp_limit_shut_down: Maximum active power decrease at shut down, per unit of the nominal power.   Only read if committable is True.
attrs.weight: Weighting of a generator. Only used for network clustering.
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net generation)
attrs.status: Status (1 is on, 0 is off). Only outputted if committable is True.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper p_nom limit
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower p_nom limit
attrs.mu_p_set: Shadow price of fixed power generation p_set
attrs.mu_ramp_limit_up: Shadow price of upper ramp up limit
attrs.mu_ramp_limit_down: Shadow price of lower ramp down limit

StorageUnit.description: Storage unit with fixed nominal-energy-to-nominal-power ratio.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus: Name of bus to which storage unit is attached.
attrs.control: P,Q,V control strategy for PF, must be "PQ", "PV" or "Slack".
attrs.type: Placeholder for storage unit type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.p_nom: Nominal power for limits in OPF.
attrs.p_nom_mod: Nominal power of the storage unit module.
attrs.p_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity p_nom to be extended in OPF.
attrs.p_nom_min: If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
attrs.p_nom_max: If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential).
attrs.p_min_pu: The minimum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the OPF (negative sign implies storing mode withdrawing power from bus).
attrs.p_max_pu: The maximum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the OPF.
attrs.carrier: Prime mover energy carrier (e.g. coal, gas, wind, solar); required for global constraints on primary energy in OPF
attrs.marginal_cost: Marginal cost of production of 1 MWh.
attrs.marginal_cost_quadratic: Quadratic marginal cost of production (discharge) of 1 MWh.
attrs.marginal_cost_storage: Marginal cost of energy storage of 1 MWh for one hour.
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending p_nom by 1 MW, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.state_of_charge_initial: State of charge before the snapshots in the OPF.
attrs.state_of_charge_initial_per_period: Switch: if True, then state of charge at the beginning of an investment period is set to state_of_charge_initial
attrs.state_of_charge_set: State of charge set points for snapshots in the OPF.
attrs.cyclic_state_of_charge: Switch: if True, then state_of_charge_initial is ignored and the initial state of charge is set to the final state of charge for the group of snapshots in the OPF (soc[-1] = soc[len(snapshots)-1]).
attrs.cyclic_state_of_charge_per_period: Switch: if True, then the cyclic constraints are applied to each period (first snapshot level if multiindexed) separately.
attrs.max_hours: Maximum state of charge capacity in terms of hours at full output capacity p_nom
attrs.efficiency_store: Efficiency of storage on the way into the storage.
attrs.efficiency_dispatch: Efficiency of storage on the way out of the storage.
attrs.standing_loss: Losses per hour to state of charge.
attrs.inflow: Inflow to the state of charge, e.g. due to river inflow in hydro reservoir.
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net generation)
attrs.state_of_charge: State of charge as calculated by the OPF.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper p_nom limit
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower p_nom limit
attrs.mu_state_of_charge_set: Shadow price of fixed state of charge state_of_charge_set
attrs.mu_energy_balance: Shadow price of storage consistency equations

Store.description: Generic store, whose capacity may be optimised.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus: Name of bus to which store is attached.
attrs.type: Placeholder for store type. Not yet implemented.
attrs.carrier: Energy carrier of the Store, e.g. "heat" or "gas".
attrs.e_nom_mod: Nominal energy capacity of the store module.
attrs.e_nom_extendable: Switch to allow capacity e_nom to be extended in OPF.
attrs.e_nom_min: If e_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
attrs.e_nom_max: If e_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by technical potential).
attrs.e_min_pu: Minimal value of e relative to e_nom for the OPF.
attrs.e_max_pu: Maximal value of e relative to e_nom for the OPF.
attrs.e_initial: Energy before the snapshots in the OPF.
attrs.e_initial_per_period: Switch: if True, then at the beginning of each investment period e is set to e_initial
attrs.e_cyclic: Switch: if True, then e_initial is ignored and the initial energy is set to the final energy for the group of snapshots in the OPF.
attrs.e_cyclic_per_period: Switch: if True, then the cyclic constraints are applied to each period (first snapshot level if multiindexed) separately.
attrs.marginal_cost: Marginal cost applied to both charging and discharging of 1 MWh.
attrs.marginal_cost_quadratic: Quadratic marginal cost of applied to charging and discharging of 1 MWh.
attrs.marginal_cost_storage: Marginal cost of energy storage of 1 MWh for one hour.
attrs.capital_cost: Fixed period costs of extending e_nom by 1 MWh, including periodized investment costs and periodic fixed O&M costs (e.g. annuitized investment costs).
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net generation)
attrs.e: Energy as calculated by the OPF.
attrs.e_nom_opt: Optimised nominal energy capacity outputed by OPF.
attrs.mu_upper: Shadow price of upper e_nom limit
attrs.mu_lower: Shadow price of lower e_nom limit
attrs.mu_energy_balance: Shadow price of storage consistency equations

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.bus: name of bus to which generator is attached
attrs.sign: power sign (sign convention so that g>0 withdraws p from bus)
attrs.p: active power at bus (positive if net load)

Shape.description: Geographical shapes of the network components.

attrs.name: Unique name
attrs.idx: Name of the component. Should be in component's index
